trans-unit.source: Provide deep links from the background app service in Cortana to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.
trans-unit.target: Provide deep links from the background app service in Cortana to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.

trans-unit.source: Deep link from Cortana to a background app
trans-unit.target: Deep link from Cortana to a background app

trans-unit.target: Deep link from Cortana to a background app

trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: Windows.ApplicationModel.VoiceCommands
trans-unit.target: Windows.ApplicationModel.VoiceCommands

trans-unit.source: Voice Command Definition (VCD) elements and attributes v1.2
trans-unit.target: Voice Command Definition (VCD) elements and attributes v1.2

trans-unit.source: Provide deep links from the background app service in **Cortana** to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.
trans-unit.target: Provide deep links from the background app service in **Cortana** to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.

trans-unit.source: A deep link is displayed by default on the **Cortana** completion screen, but you can display deep links on various other screens.
trans-unit.target: A deep link is displayed by default on the **Cortana** completion screen, but you can display deep links on various other screens.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Interact with a background app in Cortana](interact-with-a-background-app-in-cortana.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Interact with a background app in Cortana](interact-with-a-background-app-in-cortana.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: This topic builds on [Interact with a background app in Cortana](interact-with-a-background-app-in-cortana.md).
trans-unit.target: This topic builds on [Interact with a background app in Cortana](interact-with-a-background-app-in-cortana.md).

trans-unit.source: We continue using a trip planning and management app named **Adventure Works** to demonstrate various **Cortana** features.
trans-unit.target: We continue using a trip planning and management app named **Adventure Works** to demonstrate various **Cortana** features.

trans-unit.source: If you're new to developing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, have a look through these topics to get familiar with the technologies discussed here.
trans-unit.target: If you're new to developing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, have a look through these topics to get familiar with the technologies discussed here.

trans-unit.source: Create your first app
trans-unit.target: Create your first app

trans-unit.source: Learn about events with [Events and routed events overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt185584)
trans-unit.target: Learn about events with [Events and routed events overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt185584)

trans-unit.source: User experience guidelines:
trans-unit.target: User experience guidelines:

trans-unit.source: See [Cortana design guidelines](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974233) for info about how to integrate your app with **Cortana** and [Speech design guidelines](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn596121) for helpful tips on designing a useful and engaging speech-enabled app.
trans-unit.target: See [Cortana design guidelines](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974233) for info about how to integrate your app with **Cortana** and [Speech design guidelines](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn596121) for helpful tips on designing a useful and engaging speech-enabled app.

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Users can access your app through **Cortana** by:
trans-unit.target: Users can access your app through **Cortana** by:

trans-unit.source: Launching it as a foreground app (see [Launch a foreground app with voice commands in Cortana](launch-a-foreground-app-with-voice-commands-in-cortana.md)).
trans-unit.target: Launching it as a foreground app (see [Launch a foreground app with voice commands in Cortana](launch-a-foreground-app-with-voice-commands-in-cortana.md)).

trans-unit.source: Exposing specific functionality as a background app service (see [Launch a background app with voice commands in Cortana](launch-a-background-app-with-voice-commands-in-cortana.md)).
trans-unit.target: Exposing specific functionality as a background app service (see [Launch a background app with voice commands in Cortana](launch-a-background-app-with-voice-commands-in-cortana.md)).

trans-unit.source: Deep linking to specific pages, content, and state or context.
trans-unit.target: Deep linking to specific pages, content, and state or context.

trans-unit.source: We discuss the last item here.
trans-unit.target: We discuss the last item here.

trans-unit.source: Deep linking is useful when Cortana and your app service are a gateway to the full app (instead of requiring the user to launch your app through the Start menu), or for providing access to richer detail and functionality within your app that is not possible through Cortana.
trans-unit.target: Deep linking is useful when Cortana and your app service are a gateway to the full app (instead of requiring the user to launch your app through the Start menu), or for providing access to richer detail and functionality within your app that is not possible through Cortana.

trans-unit.source: Deep linking is another way to increase usability and access to your app.
trans-unit.target: Deep linking is another way to increase usability and access to your app.

trans-unit.source: There are three ways to provide deep links:
trans-unit.target: There are three ways to provide deep links:

trans-unit.source: A "Go to <app>" link on various **Cortana** screens.
trans-unit.target: A "Go to <app>" link on various **Cortana** screens.

trans-unit.source: A link embedded in a content tile on various **Cortana** screens.
trans-unit.target: A link embedded in a content tile on various **Cortana** screens.

trans-unit.source: The app service programmatically launches the foreground app.
trans-unit.target: The app service programmatically launches the foreground app.

trans-unit.source: Both **Cortana** and the background app service are terminated when the foreground app is launched.
trans-unit.target: Both **Cortana** and the background app service are terminated when the foreground app is launched.

trans-unit.source: "Go to <app>" deep link
trans-unit.target: "Go to <app>" deep link

trans-unit.source: **Cortana** can expose a "Go to <app>" deep link below the content tile on various screens.
trans-unit.target: **Cortana** can expose a "Go to <app>" deep link below the content tile on various screens.

trans-unit.source: cortana background app completion screen
trans-unit.target: cortana background app completion screen

trans-unit.source: You can provide a launch argument for this link to open your app with similar context as the app service.
trans-unit.target: You can provide a launch argument for this link to open your app with similar context as the app service.

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a launch argument, the app is launched to the main screen.
trans-unit.target: If you don't provide a launch argument, the app is launched to the main screen.

trans-unit.source: Here, we add an [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter with a value of "Las Vegas" to a [**VoiceCommandResponse**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974182) object used in the [**ReportSuccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706580) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204).
trans-unit.target: Here, we add an [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter with a value of "Las Vegas" to a [**VoiceCommandResponse**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974182) object used in the [**ReportSuccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706580) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204).

trans-unit.source: object
trans-unit.target: object

trans-unit.source: Content tile deep link
trans-unit.target: Content tile deep link

trans-unit.source: You can provide full content tile deep links on various **Cortana** screens.
trans-unit.target: You can provide full content tile deep links on various **Cortana** screens.

trans-unit.source: cortana background app hand-off screen
trans-unit.target: cortana background app hand-off screen

trans-unit.source: Like the "Go to <app>" links, you can provide a launch argument to open your app with similar context as the app service.
trans-unit.target: Like the "Go to <app>" links, you can provide a launch argument to open your app with similar context as the app service.

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a launch argument, the content tile is not linked to your app.
trans-unit.target: If you don't provide a launch argument, the content tile is not linked to your app.

trans-unit.source: Here, we add two content tiles with different [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter values to a [**VoiceCommandContentTile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974168) list used in the [**ReportSuccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706580) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204) object.
trans-unit.target: Here, we add two content tiles with different [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter values to a [**VoiceCommandContentTile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974168) list used in the [**ReportSuccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706580) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204) object.

trans-unit.source: Programmatic deep link
trans-unit.target: Programmatic deep link

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically launch your app with a launch argument to open your app with similar context as the app service.
trans-unit.target: You can also programmatically launch your app with a launch argument to open your app with similar context as the app service.

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a launch argument, the app is launched to the main screen.
trans-unit.target: If you don't provide a launch argument, the app is launched to the main screen.

trans-unit.source: Here, we add an [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter with a value of "Las Vegas" to a [**VoiceCommandResponse**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974182) object used in the [**RequestAppLaunchAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706581) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204) object.
trans-unit.target: Here, we add an [**AppLaunchArgument**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974183) parameter with a value of "Las Vegas" to a [**VoiceCommandResponse**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974182) object used in the [**RequestAppLaunchAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn706581) call of the [**VoiceCommandServiceConnection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974204) object.

trans-unit.source: App manifest
trans-unit.target: App manifest

trans-unit.source: To enable deep linking to your app, you must declare the `windows.personalAssistantLaunch` extension in the Package.appxmanifest file of your app project.
trans-unit.target: To enable deep linking to your app, you must declare the `windows.personalAssistantLaunch` extension in the Package.appxmanifest file of your app project.

trans-unit.source: Here, we declare the `windows.personalAssistantLaunch` extension for the **Adventure Works** app.
trans-unit.target: Here, we declare the `windows.personalAssistantLaunch` extension for the **Adventure Works** app.

trans-unit.source: Protocol contract
trans-unit.target: Protocol contract

trans-unit.source: Your app is launched to the foreground through Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) activation using a [**Protocol**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224693) contract.
trans-unit.target: Your app is launched to the foreground through Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) activation using a [**Protocol**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224693) contract.

trans-unit.source: Your app must override your app's [**OnActivated**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br242330) event and check for an **ActivationKind** of **Protocol**.
trans-unit.target: Your app must override your app's [**OnActivated**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br242330) event and check for an **ActivationKind** of **Protocol**.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Handle URI activation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt228339).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Handle URI activation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt228339).

trans-unit.source: Here, we decode the URI provided by the [**ProtocolActivatedEventArgs**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224742) to access the launch argument.
trans-unit.target: Here, we decode the URI provided by the [**ProtocolActivatedEventArgs**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224742) to access the launch argument.

trans-unit.source: For this example, the [**Uri**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224746) is set to "windows.personalassistantlaunch:?LaunchContext=Las Vegas".
trans-unit.target: For this example, the [**Uri**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224746) is set to "windows.personalassistantlaunch:?LaunchContext=Las Vegas".
